patient_info: Proteinuria,Abnormal renal glomerulus morphology,Hydronephrosis,Abnormality of the neck,Hematuria,Hypothyroidism,Hypertension,Hyperpigmentation of the skin,Thickened skin,Ascites,Pericardial effusion,Abnormal left ventricle morphology,Splenomegaly,Weight loss,Thrombocytosis,Abnormal tubulointerstitial morphology,Diarrhea,Ischemic stroke,Hyperuricemia,Hyperkalemia,Pleural effusion,Lymphadenopathy,Lymphadenitis,Elevated circulating creatinine concentration,Increased circulating IgA level,Abdominal distention,Somatic sensory dysfunction,Difficulty climbing stairs,Elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate,Abnormal gastric mucosa morphology,Enterocolitis,Tricuspid regurgitation,Lower limb muscle weakness,Pedal edema,Abnormality of adrenal morphology,Abnormality of adrenal physiology,Dysesthesia,Hand muscle weakness,Abnormal circulating thyroid hormone concentration
golden_diagnosis: POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome,POEMS 综合征/POEMS syndrome/POEMS syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. POEMS Syndrome
2. Multisystemic fibrosclerosis (scleroderma with renal involvement)
3. Mixed connective tissue disease
4. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) with renal and cardiovascular involvement
5. Endocrine neoplasia with paraneoplastic syndrome, such as pheochromocytoma or thyroid cancer
6. Renal cell carcinoma with paraneoplastic syndrome
7. Autoimmune polyendocrine syndrome (APS), type 1 or type 2
8. Hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH)
9. Inflammatory myopathy with overlapping features of dermatomyositis and lupus
10. Tubulointerstitial nephritis with multi-organ involvement, possibly related to drug-induced hypersensitivity reactions or infections

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the symptoms provided and without further clinical, laboratory, and imaging studies, a precise diagnosis cannot be made. A comprehensive evaluation by a multidisciplinary team is necessary for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.
